name: PolitiView
overview:
PolitiView.com is a real-time video marketplace for politics that puts the voter in charge. Voters can watch, analyze and comparison shop - just like they do for any other important purchase decision.

PolitiView.com provides context, and brings the campaigns and issues directly to voters in the video format they know and have come to expect in today’s online world. With easy-to-use “smart search” tools, voters can instantly connect to all the candidates within their electoral districts; and can easily access the special issue groups and ballot measure organizations that matter to them.

PolitiView.com is free to visitors and completely nonpartisan. Candidates and political organizations pay a monthly subscription fee to wage their campaigns in real-time by supplying a wide range of video content to better inform voters.

PolitiView offers affordability, accessibility and viability for emerging candidates, as well as established political actors across the ideological spectrum. It’s a grassroots way for voters and political campaigns to connect where it matters – in the voter’s backyard.
